badgeDescription: Skilled in data analysis, with expertise in statistical modeling and data visualization. Proficient in Python, SQL, and machine learning algorithms.
Certification earned after completing an intensive web development bootcamp. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular web frameworks like React and Vue.js.
Proven track record of developing and implementing successful digital marketing campaigns. Proficient in SEO, SEM, social media marketing, and email marketing strategies.
Experienced cybersecurity professional with expertise in threat detection, incident response, and security risk management. Skilled in network security, cryptography, and ethical hacking techniques.
Certified project manager with a proven track record of successfully leading and delivering complex projects on time and within budget. Proficient in Agile and Waterfall methodologies.
Licensed CPA with extensive experience in financial accounting, auditing, and taxation. Proficient in accounting software such as QuickBooks and SAP.
Creative designer with a focus on user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design. Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite, Figma, and prototyping tools.
Certified Scrum Master with expertise in Agile project management methodologies. Skilled in facilitating Agile ceremonies, backlog grooming, and sprint planning.
Data science professional with experience in data preprocessing, predictive modeling, and machine learning. Proficient in Python, R, TensorFlow, and scikit-learn.
Certified ethical hacker with skills in penetration testing, vulnerability assessment, and cybersecurity best practices. Experienced in identifying and mitigating security threats.
